revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=AmbiCom |model=WL1100B-AR |revision= |manuf=Z-Com |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand= |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand= |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass=default |oui= |oui_eth= }} ''Wave2Net IEEE 802.11b Wireless Access Router''
[http://web.archive.bibalex.org/web/20030110180748/http://www.ambicom.com/products/wave2net/wl1100b-ar.html Product page (via archive.org)]
[http://ec1.images-amazon.com/media/i3d/01/A/man-migrate/MANUAL000036456.pdf Manual (on Amazon.com)] The default telnet password appears to be '''default'''. The manual shows the sample SSID to be '''Wireless Lan''', but states the default SSID to be '''My Network'''. The device has a probable 00:60:B3 OUI ('''Z-Com''').
